metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7264 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in the fz_subsample_pixmap function infitz/pixmap.c in Artifex Software, Inc. MuPDF 1.10a allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7264` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.9a+ds1-4
mupdf-tools - 1.9a+ds1-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9a+ds1-4').
